document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">held </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Wick </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">above </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">west </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Red </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">declined </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Amber </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">aided </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Defied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">defined </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">waned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">disparagement </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">dissembling </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Hue </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Eye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">decide </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">abide </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: These held their wick above the west
